fullText: Mary-Louise Parker delivers a magnificent performance in Adam Rapp's haunting two-hander about a creative writing professor and her gifted student.
dtliExcerpt: Mary-Louise Parker delivers a magnificent performance in Adam Rapp's haunting two-hander about a creative writing professor and her gifted student.
